dict.acceptation: 阅读，朗读；显示；研究；看得懂；
阅读；读物；读书；里德（人名）；
被朗读的；博识的；博览的；有学问的；

sent.orig: Read after me. Read after the tape. Read by yourself.
sent.trans: 跟我读跟录音读。自己读。

sent.orig: Whenever i read a book, first i read the beginning and then i read the ending.
sent.trans: 不管读什么书，我总是先看开始，然后看结局。

sent.orig: Read edit and re-read your letter for typos. Ask a friend to read it too.
sent.trans: 读你的打印稿、然后修改、然后再重读，再让一位朋友也帮忙读读。

sent.orig: It is not how much you read but what you read that counts.
sent.trans: 重要的不是你读了多少书，而是读了些什么书。

sent.orig: They have only been read as the multitude read the stars, at most astrologically, not astronomically.
sent.trans: 它们之被群众阅读，有如群众之阅览繁星，至多是从星象学而不是从天文学的角度阅览的。
